features: 【2.4G Wireless Stable Transmission, Plug & Play】- Only one USB receiver is used for both the keyboard and mouse, providing easy installation by simply plugging the receiver into your computer port without the need for any drivers. The advanced 2.4G technology boosts the range up to 33ft, allowing for wireless typing with convenience.

【Calculator Button, Hotkeys and Fn Lock】- The keyboard features 12 multimedia hotkeys and 6 commonly used office key combinations to enhance convenience and efficiency for both work and leisure activities. Meanwhile, the Fn lock provides an additional level of convenience. The calculator buttons allow you to quickly open the computer’s calculator program, saving you valuable time.

【Slim & Ergonomic Design】- The thin wireless keyboard has 110 keys and accommodates most typing habits while taking up less space than traditional full-sized keyboards. Its ultra-slim and streamlined shape adds a classy and minimalist touch to your small desktop. The ergonomic full size keyboard has a tilt angle for more comfortable typing and improved work efficiency.

【Silent Keyboard and Mouse】All keys on the office keyboard use scissor structure switches, making the keyboard ultra-thin, lightweight, responsive, noise free, and typing soft and comfortable. Silent cordless mouse keyboard fits office, home, library, dormitory, and so on. Never worry about disturbing others to rest while working or playing.

【High Precision Mouse with 3 Adjustable DPI】- The professional Beken RF IC chip provides fantastic user experience with fast response, stable refresh rate, and smooth tracking. The mouse has adjustable DPI levels (1000/1600/2400 DPI) to meet various needs, such as work or learning online.

【Mouse with Invisible Light Design】- The wireless mouse features a lightless design without any strong and glaring red light at the bottom. You don’t have to worry about discomfort in your eyes caused by strong light, which is especially friendly for curious kids.

【Long Battery Life & Auto Power Saving】- This computer mouse and keyboard set features an ultra power-saving design, greatly extending the battery life. The wireless mouse keyboard combo has a smart sleep mode that saves power. The devices will enter deep sleep mode after 10 minutes of inactivity, and you can wake them up by pressing any button or key.

【Wide Compatibility & One-Year Warranty】- This mouse keyboard is compatible with your PC, desktop computer, laptop, or notebook, and is designed to work with Windows 7/8/10/11/XP/Vista systems. Keyboard and mouse is also available for macOS/iOS/Android/Chrome OS/Linux, but the Fn multimedia keys may not function properly. When you purchase a SHUNJINRUN wireless keyboard and mouse, you are entitled to our one-year RISK-FREE product warranty, which includes free replacement or a full refund.

Plug and Play With reliable 2.4GHz Wireless Connection, you do not need to worry about too many messy cables. plug and play, the keyboard and mouse will connect automatically in seconds. Full Size Keyboard with Office Shortcut Keys The keyboard has 110 keys in total, including 'Select All', 'Copy', 'Cut', 'Paste', 'Right mouse button Menu key' , 'Calculator key' and 12 multimedia hotkeys.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stylish, Ultra-Thin Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo - Upgrade Your Workspace

Scissor Structured Keyboard and Silent Mouse The silent keyboard uses a scissor switch mechanism to minimize keystroke noise, while a silent mouse employs silent scrolling technology for quieter movements and clicks. These tools can enhance productivity and focus by reducing distractions in a quiet environment. Ultra Thin Wireless Mouse Keyboard Slim keyboard and mouse for a tidy workspace with comfort and style. This keyboard and mouse set is made slim to save desk space, yet still offers a comfortable typing experience. The sleek, modern design of this set is perfect for anyone who values minimalism. 2-in-1 USB Receiver, Plug and Play The keyboard and mouse share one USB receiver, plug and play, no need to download any drivers, simple and convenient to use. The wireless range of up to 10 meters ensures seamless and reliable use even in large rooms or office spaces.

Keyboard with Commonly Shortcut Keys and Calculator Button This keyboard allows for easy access to commonly used functions with its built-in shortcut keys, and the calculator buttons allow you to quickly open the computer’s calculator program, saving you valuable time. 3 Adjustable DPI and Silent Click Mouse This mouse not only adopts a silent click design to reduce noise pollution in the working environment, but also comes with three adjustable DPI-1000-1600-2400, allowing you to accurately control your work. Mouse with No Light Design The lightless mouse has no glaring red light at the bottom. You don’t have to worry about discomfort in your eyes caused by strong light, which is especially friendly for curious kids.

SHUNJINRUN Ultra-Thin Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Ultra-Thin Design Ultra thin (5.5mm) full size keyboard looks more stylish and elegant, perfect for saving desk space. Low-profile keys are responsive & quiet and similar to a laptop keyboard. Plug and Play With reliable 2.4GHz Wireless Connection, you do not need to worry about too many messy cables. plug and play, the keyboard and mouse will connect automatically in seconds. Full Size Keyboard with Office Shortcut Keys The keyboard has 110 keys in total, including 'Select All', 'Copy', 'Cut', 'Paste', 'Right mouse button Menu key' , 'Calculator key' and 12 multimedia hotkeys. Features Ultra Thin Quiet Click Plug and Play Fn Lock, Calculator Button Long Battery Life Ergonomic Design 2400 DPI Mouse No Light Mouse

What's in the box: 1 * Wireless Keyboard, 1 * Wireless Mouse, 1 * USB Receiver, (NOTE: The USB receiver is stored at the bottom of the mouse). 1 * User Manual. Trouble shooting: 1. Trying moving the keyboard and mouse more closer to USB nano receiver 2. Pull out the USB receiver and plug it firmly to USB port 3. Please Replace the battery if mouse and keyboard become lag or inconsistant connection. The RED power LED will blink every 5s if low battery 4. Plug your nano receiver to some other USB port of your PC or laptop 5. Try to pair the keyboard and mouse with nano receiver again if power led indicatesin RED but no response. Press and hold "Esc" and "+/=" for 3 seconds, the keyboard enters pairing mode. Press and hold the "left button, middle button and right button" of the mouse for 5 seconds, the mouse enters pairing mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a wireless keyboard that works...
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard has the touch of a good laptop. Not clunky and it is quiet. I noticed that some reviews of the product did not actually match this actual keyboard. This one uses batteries and is not rechargeable, which is what I wanted. I'm using the USB chip and not Bluetooth. Finally a keyboard that types the keys I hit, no skipping and no adding of letters!!! It's a little larger than other wireless boards but I mostly use it at the office with my large monitors anyway. The key layout is exactly what I wanted as well. The mouse is higher quality than the last couple wireless setups I've had. I did need to up it's speed setting which was easy. Too early to note the battery life but so far it's exactly what I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Office workspace Design
reviews.reviewText: Great product with battery life. Keyboard is easy to type on and ergonomic. Great bundle price and recommend product for office or home. Seller is great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: overall its great but my main issue is the disconnecting i get if you don't use the mouse after a few minutes. Just stops working and sometimes turning it off then on again doesn't seem to always work. You have to wait a few seconds then try again. The keyboard is great took awhile before i got accustomed to it, feels comfortable couldve done better on the spacing i sometimes feel like im over or underreaching on Keys. Very responsive, no delays so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with quality and price
reviews.reviewText: For the price , this combo mouse and keyboard is a steal, quality is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: my favorite keyboard by far! easy to charge with the USB cord. very comfortable to type on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Keyboard stopped working after 1 week. Mouse is not fully functional
reviews.reviewText: I was very upset that the keyboard stopped working after only one week. I would return it but I threw it away . Didn't want to waste my time waiting in line to return something that isn't worth the money I paid for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Decent, especially if you like laptop keyboards…mouse not so much
reviews.reviewText: So, just a few days outside the return window, the mouse just stopped working. I thought it might need a charge, though it had only been a few days and it lasted a couple weeks the first charge…but, no, nothing. Tried multiple charging cables, USB ports, and chargers…nothing. Wasn’t a great mouse to being with, though it was a decent shape and very light, and the resolution button was handy…but it isn’t ‘silent’. Don’t get me wrong, the buttons aren’t clicky and annoying, but the scroll wheel squeaks like crazy and the whole mouse creaks a bit when you rest your hand on it. I was fine with it though, while it worked.The keyboard is fine…thin key caps like a laptop keyboard, with smaller size keys than regular keyboards (also like a laptop), so you may mistype a bit. It is quite thin and portable, and I really like the layout. I do experience the ‘double letter’ issue some have mentioned, but it only happens now and then. Again, it’s fine. Biggest complaint would be the huge “USB” printed in white on the usb dongle…yes, we know it is usb, thanks, no need to scream it to everyone who looks at my laptop. Anyway, it’ll wind up in a closet since the crappy mouse died and I can’t be plugging in two dongles (for a different mouse) since I don’t have the ports for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wireless mouse, keyboard combo
reviews.reviewText: Worked good for a year, then The mouse would not charge. The keyboard continues to be working, great and charging like it should.
Si cumple con las especificaciones y es muy fácil de programar, así como de transportar en cualquier mochila

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente producto de muy buena calidad

reviews.reviewText: I have a problem with batteries dying and also connection with PC with every wireless mouse I have every used. This one works great and when it does die I just plug it in, no more pulling batteries in and out. It also seem to stay in contact with my hard drive.. no more frozen mouse because it disconnected. Keyboard is a nice size and I am enjoying using it.
Es buen teclado, la carga dura todo el día, pero no tiene Ñ y eso causa algún problema, de resto está muy bien
